          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing books, a project for 7th and 8th grade.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Bücher, ein Projekt für 7. und 8. 
Grad.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Livres d'écriture, un projet pour la 7ème et

          <description>
            <string language="en">An article for educators with information about class project work and how to implement a book writing project</string>
